project_abstract.cdata: The Fourth National Highway Project for China aims to increase economic activity along the Wuhan-Changsha high-priority transport corridor through relieving congestion, facilitating trade and mobility, and increasing efficiency and traffic safety in Northern Hunan and Southern Hubei. There are four project components. The first has several subcomponents including construction of two expressway sections; building of interconnecting and other roads; supplying equipment to control construction quality and environmental monitoring, to operate and monitor the new expressway sections, and maintain the provincial road network; and construction supervision services. The second component funds studies and technical assistance in highway maintenance management, transport and trade integration, expressway commercialization and corporatization, and road safety as well as staff training programs covering all aspects of highway planning, design, construction, operation, finance, and maintenance. The third component funds the front-end fee while the fourth component finances land acquisition and resettlement.

P041268.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第四国家公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>项目是主要目的是帮助中国改善北京－广州高速公路系统，加强部分大中城市之间的贸易联系，把偏远地区和大中城市连接起来。该项目还将通过改善通向沿海城市的通道，帮助缩小内地和沿海省之间的收入差距，使湖南和湖北更密切地融入国际贸易体系，促进中国的对外贸易发展。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
